title: Leash & Calm Greetings
summary: Introduce walking gear and polite social manners.

lessons.title: Harness Intro
lessons.objective: Puppy becomes comfortable wearing a harness.
steps: Slip harness on partially, treat, remove.
Gradually clip fully for short periods.
supportGuidelines: If puppy resists: break into smaller steps, go slower.
lessons.safetyNotes: Ensure fit isn’t too tight; remove if chewing straps.

lessons.title: Indoor Leash Intro
lessons.objective: Teach puppy to move calmly on leash indoors.
steps: Attach leash, drop treats near you while walking slowly.
supportGuidelines: Keep sessions short to prevent pulling habit.
lessons.safetyNotes: Never jerk leash; encourage following willingly.

lessons.title: Calm Greetings 1
lessons.objective: Teach puppy to sit politely for attention.
steps: Ask puppy to Sit before greeting.
Person pets only when puppy remains seated.
If jumping: withdraw attention until four paws down.
supportGuidelines: Train family/guests to follow same rule.
